title: Its was pretty much on them.
body: So lets started off with ive been on this God forsaken game since beta-season 1 and ive jungled since season 3 and as any jungle main knows we kinda get dicked on champ releases for our role ( our last pure jungler champ to be released was kayn over 2 years ago) so some of use tend to try out crazy shit because of low champ pool boredom. Tonight I tested jungle akali (spoiler alert its complete SHIT) I told the team in champ select it would suck, gave them a win rate, and said buckle up and they decided to stay in SO OFF WE GO. Well we get inavded blah blah blah i end up with no leash and a stolen buff on a jungler thats shit so yeah i was EXTREMELY far behind then my team starts going mental (which i somewhat understand I was doing NOTHING). You really dont get to be mad about this outcome simply because if youre told that someone is going to do something thats going to make you mad and you say nothing and choose to stay its on you.
